title: Darkstream: on the hunt
author: VD
content_html: Original AH:Q backers, especially those who opted out of the class-action waiver, are going to want to watch this Darkstream. If you want to support our efforts in this regard, which we anticipate will begin in earnest next week, please consider backing the current Alt-Hero:Q campaign.
content_text:
